requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: 2012-era Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel or AMD Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: 2020-era Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel or AMD Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core Processor
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M-series Graphics or Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13 Ventura
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M-series Graphics or Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel or AMD Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel or AMD Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
